RATING 5.0 Wall 2 Wall Mart Mexican, Seafood, Casual/Family, Fast Food 3308 Indianola Ave, Des Moines (515) 282-4004 LATEST REVIEW Excellent food, lots of choices and everything is very tasty and prepared well and quickly. They have the absolute BEST SALSA in town. They give you three different kinds of Salsa and chips free when you dine in. Try the Giant Burrito! Great lun... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 4.8 B&B Grocery Meat&Deli Deli/Sandwich/Subs, Fast Food 2001 Southeast 6th Street, Des Moines (515) 243-7607 DESCRIPTION B&B Grocery, Meat&Deli is a neighborhood grocery store with an outstanding deli and old-fashion meat market. It has been family owned and operated since Archie and John Brooks opened it in May 1922.
Since then five generations of the Brooks ... LATEST REVIEW B&B;is the best place to go and get a great sandwich. The people there are the best. It reminds me of a store I would find back home in Boston. I love the sandwiches and the meat is excellent REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO
RATING 4.0 Big Tomato Pizza CO Pizzeria, Fast Food 2613 Ingersoll Avenue, Des Moines (515) 288-7227 LATEST REVIEW The food is wonderful. It has a very diverse and unusual list of ingredients. I really like the slices after midnight but I think they should sell slices all day long! The service is not that great. Don't ever get delivery (they couldn't find my apar... REVIEW RESTAURANT CHANGE INFO

RATING 3.8 Two Girls One Cup Deli/Sandwich/Subs, Fast Food 3705 Ingersoll Avenue, Jovphglrzazhh, Des Moines (515) 274-1208 DESCRIPTION two girls one cup.com LATEST REVIEW It's certainly better than the overpriced slop they serve at Palmer's Deli. Jason's Deli is better in my opinion. It isn't much of a "Deli" really, it's a sandwich shop. The Mama Mia is their best sandwich by far. The staff seem to be the resident pe...
